title: Bitterman's Goodbye, Shaq's Divorce, NBA Action, Slap Warning and more.
itunes:title: Bitterman's Goodbye, Shaq's Divorce, NBA Action, Slap Warning and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Junior brings up something Big Dog mentioned yesterday and asks a question.  The Chief Love Officer must separate the sweetness between mom and daughter.  Men are not emotionally equipped to handle divorce like women, just ask Shaq.  Fool #2 gives us reasons for Black card revocation.  This is an anti-slap warning ahead of the upcoming Tony Awards.  "NBA action, it's fantastic!"  J. Anthony Brown is leaving radio.  S"Watch out deh now!"

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
